recipes.name: pasta carbonara
steps: Boil water and cook the pasta.
In a pan, heat some oil and add the eggs, stirring constantly.
Drain the pasta and mix with the egg mixture.
Add cheese, salt, and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt.
In a separate bowl, whisk together milk, eggs, and melted butter.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until smooth.
Heat a pan over medium heat and pour batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
steps: Wash and chop the lettuce.
In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
Drizzle with caesar dressing and toss to coat.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
steps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions, garlic, and ginger.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
Add chopped tomatoes and spices, cook until fragrant.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve with rice or bread.

recipes.name: Beef Burger
steps: Cook the beef patty on a grill or pan.
Toast the burger buns lightly.
Assemble the burger by placing cheese on the patty, then adding lettuce, tomato, and onion.
Top with ketchup and mustard, and close the bun.
Serve with fries.

recipes.name: Lasagna
steps: Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
Sauté onions and garlic, then add ground beef and cook until browned.
Add tomato sauce and herbs, simmer for 15 minutes.
Layer noodles, meat sauce, and cheese in a baking dish.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Fruit Smoothie
steps: Place all fruits, yogurt, and ice cubes in a blender.
Add a drizzle of honey.
Blend until smooth.
Serve in glasses and enjoy!

recipes.name: Cheese Omelette
steps: Crack eggs into a bowl and whisk with salt and pepper.
Heat butter in a pan and pour in the egg mixture.
Cook on low heat until the eggs are set, then sprinkle cheese on top.
Fold the omelette and serve.

recipes.name: Fried Rice
steps: Cook rice and let it cool.
In a pan, heat oil and sauté onions and carrots.
Add beaten eggs and scramble.
Add cooled rice, peas, and soy sauce.
Stir fry for a few minutes and serve.

recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
steps: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and sugar.
Add butter, eggs, milk, and vanilla, and mix until smooth.
Pour the batter into a greased cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
Allow the cake to cool before frosting and serving.
